name: The Abyssal Maze
description:
In this short Voxel Style,  horror maze game. You will be exploring a maze trying to find the exit before your sanity runs out. Be careful because if your sanity gets too low a monster will spawn and chase you down.

Controls:
WASD movement

Left CTRL for crouch

Left Shifr for sprint

E to pick up objects

Space to jump

Credits.

UI Art and 3d modeler: The Wizard

Music composition: Meggie

Programmer and 3d environment artist: Caliber5
